about_the_game:
The Official Soundtrack of The Edge of Allegoria, featuring classic hits like "My Goodness!", "Oh Shit!", and the fan-favourite "Holy Fucknuts!"

Relive the thrilling adventures of The Edge of Allegoria in this 52-track behemoth, with over 2 hours and 45 minutes of original music straight from the game. Experience the shifting sounds of each status effect as the remixed tracks blend together before returning to "Normal."

*The developer of The Edge of Allegoria is not responsible for any urges to beat up local wildlife with a fishing rod as a result of listening to this soundtrack. Listeners accept full responsibility for any epic quests or grand adventures that may result from enjoying this music.
